memberdef.argsstring: (Structured< VL, SL > L, VA &&A, Vd &&d)
memberdef.name: hyhound_diag

briefdescription.para: Update Cholesky factor L using low-rank term A diag(d) Aᵀ.

memberdef.argsstring: (Structured< VL, SL > L, VA &&A, Vd &&d, VW &&W)
memberdef.name: hyhound_diag

briefdescription.para: Update Cholesky factor L using low-rank term A diag(d) Aᵀ, with full Householder representation.

memberdef.argsstring: (Structured< VL, SL > L)
memberdef.name: hyhound_size_W

briefdescription.para: Get the size of the storage for the matrix W returned by hyhound_diag(Structured<VL,SL>, VA&&, Vd&&, VW&&).

memberdef.argsstring: (VL &&L, VA &&A, VD &&D, VB &&B, Vd &&d, VW &&W, index_t kA_in_offset=0)
memberdef.name: hyhound_diag_apply

briefdescription.para: Apply Householder transformation generated by hyhound_diag, computing (L̃, D) = (L, A) Q̆.

parameterdescription.para: Part of the Cholesky factor to be updated (rectangular). Overwritten by L̃.
Householder reflector vectors returned by hyhound_diag.
If A is smaller than D, A is implicitly padded with zero columns: the offset of the nonzero part of A in the padded matrix can be specified using kA_in_offset.

memberdef.argsstring: (VL &&L, VA &&A, VB &&B, Vd &&d, VW &&W)
memberdef.name: hyhound_diag_apply

briefdescription.para: Apply Householder transformation generated by hyhound_diag, computing (L̃, Ã) = (L, A) Q̆.

parameterdescription.para: Part of the Cholesky factor to be updated (rectangular). Overwritten by L̃.
Householder reflector vectors returned by hyhound_diag.

memberdef.argsstring: (Structured< VL, SL > L, VA &&A, Vd &&d)
memberdef.name: hyhound_sign

briefdescription.para: Update Cholesky factor L using low-rank term A diag(copysign(1, d)) Aᵀ, where d contains only ±0 values.

memberdef.argsstring: (Structured< VL1, SL > L1, VA1 &&A1, VL2 &&L2, VA2 &&A2, Vd &&d)
memberdef.name: hyhound_diag_2

briefdescription.para: Update Cholesky factor L using low-rank term A diag(d) Aᵀ, where L and A are stored as two separate block rows.

para.formula: \[ L = \begin{pmatrix} L_{11} \\ L_{21} \end{pmatrix}, \quad A = \begin{pmatrix} A_{1} \\ A_{2} \end{pmatrix}. \]

memberdef.argsstring: (Structured< VL11, SL > L11, VA1 &&A1, VL21 &&L21, VA2 &&A22, VA2o &&A2_out, VU &&L31, VA3 &&A31, VA3o &&A3_out, Vd &&d)
memberdef.name: hyhound_diag_cyclic

briefdescription.para: Update structured Cholesky factor L using structured low-rank term A diag(d) Aᵀ,.

para.formula: \[ L = \begin{pmatrix} L_{11} \\ L_{21} \\ L_{31} \end{pmatrix}, \quad A = \begin{pmatrix} A_{11} & A_{12} \\ 0 & A_{22} \\ A_{31} & 0 \end{pmatrix}, \quad \tilde A = \begin{pmatrix} 0 \\ \tilde A_{2} \\ \tilde A_{3} \end{pmatrix}. \]

memberdef.argsstring: (Structured< VL11, SL > L11, VA1 &&A1, VL21 &&L21, VA2 &&A2, VA2o &&A2_out, VLu1 &&Lu1, VAuo &&Au_out, Vd &&d, bool shift_A_out=false)
memberdef.name: hyhound_diag_riccati

briefdescription.para: Update structured Cholesky factor L using structured low-rank term A diag(d) Aᵀ,.

detaileddescription.para: \[ L = \begin{pmatrix} L_{11} \\ L_{21} \\ L_{u} \end{pmatrix}, \quad A = \begin{pmatrix} A_{1} \\ A_{2} \\ 0 \end{pmatrix}, \quad \tilde A = \begin{pmatrix} 0 \\ \tilde A_{2} \\ \tilde A_{u} \end{pmatrix}. \] The shift_A_out parameter indicates whether the output matrix A2_out should be shifted along the batch dimension. This is used in the Cyqlone solver.
